description:
Night and day, Jack faces the fury of the two sworn defenders of Zou, but while they put up a good fight, the Minks aren`t able to subdue Jack, especially after he brings out his secret weapon...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Hauptstadt in Trümmern – Auftritt der Kringelhut-Piratenbande!
La capitale anéantie. L`équipage du sourcil torsadé à la rescousse !
Shuto Kaimetsu: Guruware no Ichimi Jouriku!
The Exterminated Capital! The Twirly Hat Crew Arrive!
العاصمة المبادة! وصول طاقم القبعة المدوّرة!
首都壊滅 ぐるわらの一味上陸!
